level.heading: Penalty for violation of final order.
level.text: A person who violates an outstanding and effective final order shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and, upon conviction, shall be fined not more than $5,000, imprisoned not more than one year, or both.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-308
level.text: For Law 13-308, see notes following ยง 26-551.01.
